messages.subject: Re: Digest Number 1693
messages.msgSnippet: I don t know much about them, but I know there are homeopathic/holistic veterinarians who do not believe in vaccinating pets. If I believed that animals and
messages.messageBody:
I don't know much about them, but I know there are
homeopathic/holistic veterinarians who do not believe in vaccinating
pets.

If I believed that animals and humans are equal in importance <g>, I
wouldn't vaccinate my pets. I don't vaccinate my kids anymore because
I believe that the risks of vaccinations are generally greater than
the benefits. However, I do vaccinate my pets because even though I
realize there are risks, I am willing to take the chance of those
risks with an animal if it means potentially protecting a human from
rabies or even just protecting myself from a socialistic law.
Sheila

> > If she was spayed she will have been vaced. No vet or shelter
would do it
> >w/out all vacs given.
>
> It ain't necessarily so......
> My daughter found a vet who neutered her cats without vacs.
> Tia
>
> No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
> Eleanor Roosevelt
> *********************************************
> Tia Leschke
> leschke@i...
> On Vancouver Island
